doc.powers: Coat of Arms possesses Tiboro's coat which gives the wearer four extra appendages as well as the ability to pull virtually anything from its pockets. The coat can generates a force shield around the wearer, protecting him or her from physical harm. It has yet to be revealed if Tiboro's coat grants Coat of Arms any other magical abilities or a connection to Tiboro.
significantissues: First time in action and confronted by Young Avengers (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #1, 2009)
potentially offered a place on Young Avengers (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #2, 2009) partnered with Speed as part of recruiting session (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #3, 2009)
offered membership into Young Avengers but declined (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #4, 2009)
helped Wiccan and Enchantress banish Sentry (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #5, 2009)
